before.title: Decouple CLI wrapper from hardcoded script mappings
before.description: MEDIUM RISK: The claude-todo wrapper has hardcoded case statement mapping commands to scripts. If scripts are renamed (like we almost did with -todo suffix), wrapper breaks silently. FIX: Generate wrapper from script directory listing, use config file for mappings, or convention-based routing (command name = script name).

after.description: MEDIUM RISK: The claude-todo wrapper has hardcoded case statement mapping commands to scripts. FIX: Generate wrapper from script directory listing, use config file for mappings, or convention-based routing (command name = script name).
